name: hk2/multianalytics
description: HK2 Multi Analytics - Offers easy integration of your ecommerce store with integrating Google Tag Manager, Facebook Domain Verification & Pixel Code in Magento Store saving you the hassle of manual setup. It also helps ContentSquare, etc from tracking data & providing real-time insights to improve the digital experience, increase customer happiness and drive growth.Easily configure Google Tag Manager & Facebook Pixel on your Magento 2 website. Using Magento 2 Google Tag Manager you can track the behavior of the customers coming onto your website. HK2 Multi Analytics automatically adds the Google Tag Manager code to all pages in your Magento 2 store, enabling site-wide tracking of user data. Added Google Product RSS Feed (Product feed for Google Shopping)
